channel.title: [SOLVED] Delete Items from Inventory

item.title: [SOLVED] Delete Items from Inventory
item.dc:creator: @Maizez Maizez
item.description:
@Maizez wrote:

The question was on how to clear a non-stackable item from your inventory.

	public void deleteItem(int id, int amount) {
		deleteItem(id, GetItemSlot(id), amount);
	}

Solved:

I feel like whenever I post here. My problem becomes solved.
Here was the solution, in case someone needs it later.

            for (int i = 0; i < playerItems.length; i++) {
                deleteItem(####, getItemSlot(####), 1);                
            }

Read full topic
